TEXT.TITLE: LANSON NAMES WHITBREAD PLC UNIT AS IMPORTER
TEXT.BODY: Lanson Champagne of France said it named Whitbread PLC's Regal Brands Inc unit as its exclusive U.S. importer, effective April one. Regal Brands is also the sole U.S. importer for Benedictine S.A.'s liqueurs. Reuter
